patterns: What are the health benefits of eggs?

responses: Avocados are rich in healthy fats, great for heart health!

Almonds are packed with healthy fats, vitamin E, and fiber.

patterns: What can I pair with chicken?

responses: Spinach pairs well with eggs, cheese, or grilled chicken.
Chicken goes great with steamed broccoli, roasted vegetables, or quinoa.
You can pair quinoa with beans, roasted veggies, or chicken.
Rice pairs wonderfully with grilled meats, tofu, or vegetables.
